snippet.title: Mandragora - Gamescom 2023 Gameplay Trailer | PS5 Games
snippet.description:
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10004736

Slash, burn, and rage your way through Mandragora, a 2.5D action-RPG with Metroidvania and Soulslike elements. Light your Witch Lantern, enter the dark of Entropy, and tear reality asunder.

#ps5 #ps5games #gamescom 

May contain content inappropriate for children. Visit http://www.esrb.org for rating information.
